ing: 1 (15.25 ounce) can mango slices with juice
des: "With homemade coconut milk made with our Florida friends, my son and I created this yummy smoothie using ingredients we had at home."
ins: Place coconut milk, mango slices with their juice, orange juice, and sugar into a blender, and blend until smooth; add the shaved ice, and blend again. Pour into 4 glasses, and top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkling of shaved milk chocolate.
